title: How to Power Wash a Deck

steps.headline: Ensure that all materials are present, and that the engine has sufficient gasoline and motor oil.
Attach water source to washer.
steps.description: Do not attach hot water source unless your pressure washer is made for this or you may cause internal part failure.

steps.headline: Turn faucet on at full blast.
Pull the choke a few clicks in the opposite direction of the arrow (check with your model).
Gently pull the red handle from stop to the turtle or rabbit.
Standing behind the washer, firmly grasp the manual pull crank and quickly pull the rope towards your hip.
steps.description: The engine should start with one to two motions. If the engine is not starting easily, adjust the choke and/or red handle as needed.

steps.headline: Once the engine begins to roar, pull the red handle all the way to the rabbit and pull the choke as far as it will go.
Clean vertical railings with a smooth up-down-down-up motion.

text: Ensure that all materials are present, and that the engine has sufficient gasoline and motor oil.  Attach water source to washer. Do not attach hot water source unless your pressure washer is made for this or you may cause internal part failure. Turn faucet on at full blast.  Pull the choke a few clicks in the opposite direction of the arrow (check with your model).  Gently pull the red handle from stop to the turtle or rabbit.  Standing behind the washer, firmly grasp the manual pull crank and quickly pull the rope towards your hip. The engine should start with one to two motions. If the engine is not starting easily, adjust the choke and/or red handle as needed. Once the engine begins to roar, pull the red handle all the way to the rabbit and pull the choke as far as it will go.  Clean vertical railings with a smooth up-down-down-up motion.
